titles.title: Lord, We Come Before You (Kit Mays)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, we come before You. Your dear face we seek For Your will is pleasant And Your love is deep. We would know Your ways, Lord, Fellowship with You. Hearts now undivided, Our souls and spirits true.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord, You know we love You. Lord, we know You care. In a world of trouble, We know You are near. I would be Your servant. Treat me as a son. Leave no part undealt with Until Your work is done.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Help me Lord, to know You In the midst of pain, Sorrow, fear, temptation, Turn my loss to gain. I would not resist You. Pierce straight through my heart. Till I rest within You Nevermore to depart.{/lang-eng}
